welcome_message_body: Welcome to Trecastagni, a charming town nestled at the foot of Mount Etna. Known for its picturesque streets and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to soak up the beauty and culture of our city and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fontanarossa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fontanarossa Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport, primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
